home.herotext: Your Pet Will be Loved Like a Family
home.paragraph1: We are a pet care agency that provides a safe and loving environment for your pet.
home.paragraph2: At MilouPaw, we offer professional pet sitting services to ensure your pet is cared for while you're away...

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Our commitment is to provide stress-free care for your pets.
services.description: Our services are delivered by a team of highly qualified and experienced professionals. Your pet will receive specialized care through our services.

dog_walking.name: Dog Walking
dog_walking.description: Offering dog walking sessions for all sizes, we ensure a safe and enjoyable experience. Choose from a variety of walks, including 'Senior Dog Special Walks' and 'Puppy Energy Burners', starting at $28 for 30 minutes and $35 for an hour.

pet_sitting.name: Pet Sitting
pet_sitting.description: Our pet sitting service provides comprehensive care, including meal serving, medication, and potty breaks for up to three dogs, at $35 for a 30-minute session. Ideal for busy pet parents seeking attentive care for their dogs.

boarding.name: Boarding
boarding.description: Our boarding service offers a home-like environment for your dog, with individual attention. The fee for small pets is $70 per day and $100 per day for large pets, ensuring a comfortable and tailored stay for each dog.

potty_break.name: Potty Break
potty_break.description: Our quick and efficient 10-minute potty break service, available for $20, is designed to fit into busy schedules, providing comfort and convenience for your pet.

faqs.question: Why Miloupaw?
faqs.answer: What makes miloupaw so unique? Miloupaw does not operate in bulk like many other existing service providers. We treat each client as an individual with unique needs that require a customized care package. As a company, we do not handle bulk services or provide one-stop shopping. Our pet care agency provides a safe and loving environment for your pet. In our journey with you, we begin with a personal meet and greet. After meticulously examining your pet's needs, we prepare a custom care package for your pet. In other words, you won't have to worry about any nitty-gritty details.

faqs.question: Where do I start?
faqs.answer: Getting started is very easy. First you need to connect to our system. Currently we are offering our services only to apple products users which includes both iPhone and iPad devices. Miloupaw made this process very smooth by providing you different social connections such as Apple ID and Google ID. This is a very secure way of signing up and you don’t have to remember any additional username and password. Just download the miloupaw app and start using it.

faqs.question: How do I request an appointment?
faqs.answer: As a client, you will have access to all of our services once your account has been verified, which is the meet-and-greet session. The app will then allow you to request future appointments.

faqs.question: Who would look after my pet?
faqs.answer: A primary professional familiar with your pet's needs will take care of it. It is our belief that a professional pet care provider who is friendly and familiar with your pet will reduce stress on their body and mind. In the case of emergency and unexpected situations, one of our colleagues will take care of the session.

additional_text.description: We understand that you have questions about our services. We have compiled a list of frequently asked questions to help you get the most out of our services.

gallery_component.title: Our Gallery
gallery_component.subtitle: moments we have made together
gallery_component.description: Our fluffy friends are great. We love sharing a glimpse of those great moment we spend with them. Please don’t forget to like and share these cuties. They demand attention!

reviews_component.title: Reviews
reviews_component.description: Our customers are our top priority. Your feedback helps us continually improve our services.

contact_component.title: CONTACT US
contact_component.subtitle: We value our customers' insights. Please contact us with any questions or feedback.
